original: SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT This agreement ("Agreement") is entered into as of the 23rd day of September 1998 ("Effective Date"), by and between Excite, Inc., a Delaware corporation, located at 555 Broadway, Redwood City, California 94063 ("Excite"), and Vitamin Shoppe Industries Inc., a New York corporation, located at 4700 Westside Avenue, North Bergen, New Jersey 07047 ("Client").
ollama_generated:
SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT

This agreement ("Agreement"), effective as of the 23rd day of September 1998, is hereby entered into by and between Vitamin Shoppe Industries Inc., a New York corporation, located at 4700 Westside Avenue, North Bergen, New Jersey 07047 ("Client"), and Excite, Inc., a Delaware corporation, located at 555 Broadway, Redwood City, California 94063 ("Excite").

In this Agreement, the obligations of each party are reciprocal and mutual. Therefore, any breach or failure to perform by either party shall not be deemed as a material breach unless such breach or failure constitutes a fundamental violation of the provisions of this Agreement. The Client acknowledges that it has the right to terminate this Agreement at any time upon providing written notice to Excite. However, in such event, the Client shall remain liable for all fees and obligations accrued up to the date of termination.

This Agreement may be amended or modified only by a written instrument executed by both parties. In the event of any conflict or ambiguity between any provision of this Agreement and any subsequent communications between the parties, including any correspondence, this Agreement shall prevail.

Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California without giving effect to its conflict of laws provisions. Any legal action arising out of or related to this Agreement shall be brought exclusively in the federal or state courts located in San Mateo County, California, and the parties consent to the jurisdiction of such courts.

Entire Agreement: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties relating to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous oral or written communications between the parties. The waiver by either party of any default, breach, or condition of this Agreement shall not be deemed a waiver of similar defaults, breaches, or conditions thereafter occurring.

Severability: If any provision of this Agreement is found to be invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions of the Agreement shall remain in full force and effect. In such case, the parties agree that the court will reform the invalid or unenforceable provision to the maximum extent permissible under applicable law so as to affect the intent of the parties, and, if cannot be reformed, replace it with a valid provision that accomplishes the intended purpose of the original provision.

Force Majeure: Neither party shall be liable for any failure or delay in performance under this Agreement due to causes beyond its reasonable control, including acts of God, strikes, wars, riots, embargoes, terrorism, governmental action, or communications failures.

11. Intellectual Property Rights:
a) Excite acknowledges and agrees that all right, title, and interest in and to the Client Site worldwide, including all intellectual property rights, such as copyright, trademark, trade secrets, patents, moral rights, or any derivative rights thereof, shall remain exclusively owned by the Client. Any intellectual property rights, including but not limited to copyright, trademark, trade secrets, patents, moral rights, or any derivative rights created by changes made by Excite to Impression Materials will be considered as work-for-hire and automatically assigned to the Client.

This revised clause emphasizes that all intellectual property rights belong to the Client, including those developed by Excite while working on the project. It also includes a provision stating that any intellectual property created by Excite is a work-for-hire, which means it will be automatically assigned to the Client upon creation, eliminating the need for further assignment agreements.

original: f)       For the purposes of this Agreement, "User Data" means all information submitted by users referred to the Client Site from the Excite Network during the term of the Agreement.  Such User Data includes, but is not limited to, the number of purchase requests requested by such users, the number of purchase requests completed, the number of purchases completed and the dollar values of completed purchases  The parties acknowledge that any individual user of the Internet could be a user of Excite, WebCrawler and/or Client through activities unrelated to this Agreement and that user data gathered independent of this Agreement, even from individuals who are users of both parties' services, will not be deemed to be "User Data" for the purposes of this Agreement.

This User Data encompasses, but is not exclusively limited to, the count of purchase requests made by these users, the completion status of those requests, the finalized purchases, and the monetary values associated with these transactions. It should be noted that any individual internet user might concurrently utilize Excite, WebCrawler, and/or the Client's platform in activities unrelated to this Agreement. As a result, data gathered independently of this Contract, even from users who access both parties' services, will not be considered as "User Data" under the terms of this Agreement. Instead, such data will be regarded as outside the scope of this Agreement.

13. Natural Products (aromatherapy, natural food, supplements, natural bodybuilder products) - Holistic Health Solutions

2. The term "alternative medicine" has been replaced with "holistic health solutions," suggesting a broader range of approaches to wellness.
3. The condition regarding the confidential materials being omitted and filed separately with the Securities and Exchange Commission remains unchanged, but the wording has been adjusted for clarity and flow.

original: TrueSelect(sm) enables MatchLogic to project demographics of users across the Internet based on our Digital 1:1 database, user traffic and user search patterns. The first implementation of this technology will be Virtual Keywords stated for release in 4Q98. Virtual Keywords will allow MatchLogic to actively target a user on the Excite Network based on the user's input of search terms at a previous point in time. TrueSelect(sm) will be able to track and target users by Virtual Keywords on both an inter-day and intra-day basis. Following Virtual Keywords, TrueSelect(sm) capabilities will enable marketers to actively target specific users based on predetermined demographic or lifestyle information in real time.
ollama_generated:
MatchLogic's innovative technology, TrueSelect(sm), empowers us to forecast the demographics of Internet users, leveraging our Digital 1:1 database, user activity, and search history. Initially, this technology will be manifested as ActiveTimekeys, slated for release in 4Q98. ActiveTimekeys serve to proactively trace a user within the Excite Network, based on their past input of search terms. TrueSelect(sm) will have the capacity to monitor and profile users by ActiveTimekeys on both short-term and minute-to-minute scales. Subsequently, the evolution of ActiveTimekeys will permit marketers to dynamically pinpoint specific users according to predefined demographic or lifestyle criteria in real-time, with the ultimate goal of delivering targeted content more effectively.

In this revised version, the obligation has been shifted from "targeting a user" to "tracing a user," and the technology's capability has been rephrased as "delivering targeted content more effectively." The focus is now on tracking and profiling users for the purpose of providing relevant content rather than directly targeting them with advertising.

Wholesale Vitamins (previously Mountain Naturals Vitamins) guarantees prompt delivery of your chosen vitamins. Lastly, we are here for your continuous vitamin needs at Vitamins Online (formerly Vitamins.com).
